author: cnbc.com
title: Independent Bank Group, Inc. Declares Quarterly Dividend
text:
MCKINNEY, Texas, April 25, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Independent Bank Group, Inc. (NASDAQ:IBTX), the holding company for Independent Bank, announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend in the amount of $0.14 per share of common stock. The dividend will be payable on May 17, 2018 to stockholders of record as of the close of business on May 7, 2018.
About Independent Bank Group
Independent Bank Group, through its wholly owned subsidiary, Independent Bank, provides a wide range of relationship-driven commercial banking products and services tailored to meet the needs of businesses, professionals and individuals. Independent Bank Group operates in four market regions located in the Dallas/Fort Worth, Austin and Houston, Texas and the Colorado Front Range areas.
